name: Aztecs
startIntroPart1: The great powers of Europe did not always meet good fortune when they set out to colonize the world. The Castilian empire met with particularly bad luck when they encountered the Aztecs. To the Castilians, the Aztecs seemed to be primitive savages, ripe for exploitation, but to the Aztecs, the foreigners were naive fools with precious technology worth stealing and mastering. Once they lost their technological edge, the Castilians were easy prey.
startIntroPart2: Now, with the Castilian empire defeated and plundered, the Aztecs have set their sights on the rest of the world...
attacked: Excellent! Let the blood flow in raging torrents!
defeated: Monster! Who are you to destroy my greatness?
introduction: What do I see before me? Another beating heart for my sacrificial fire.
tradeRequest: Accept this agreement or suffer the consequences.

name: New Mars
startIntroPart1: When the strange meteors fell to earth and strange beings emerged from inside, there was initial panic and a rush to arms, but people soon discovered that these strangers were not invaders, but refugees. Their homeworld of Mars (known to them as Barsoom) was dry and dying, and they wished to live on a wet, lush planet like our own. They offered marvelous technology in exchange for living space, and they soon settled in.
startIntroPart2: Their alien science makes them a formidable threat, even if they proclaim peace, but they still struggle to adapt to Earth's thick atmosphere and heavy gravity. Will they prosper on this new world, or find themselves homeless in the cosmos?
declaringWar: Your water belongs to us now. Surrender or perish!
attacked: Why do you not value peace?
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes destroyed us?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: All that fighting was exhausting anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: Unhappiness from number of Cities doubled

name: Dublin
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?

name: Sidon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Sidon is willing to serve you!

name: Almaty
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Edinburgh
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

name: M'Banza-Kongo
declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo - not to my people!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

name: Belgrade
declaringWar: Let's have a nice little War, shall we?
attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
defeated: The serbian guerilla will never stop haunting you!

name: Valletta
declaringWar: We don't like your face. To arms!
attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
defeated: This ship may sink, but our spirits will linger.
